Consider us your open source consultants. We produce the same useless documents but you don't have to pay us. Everything which is produced by BlackHat Squirrel is open source, it's completely free to use without restriction under the sole condition that you credit us somewhere along the way. If you want to contribute then even better, add / amend / ruin and share with the rest of the world. 

The best place to find all this garbage is our github page (https://github.com/blackhatsquirrel) but we'll be posting various extracts here in the form of poorly thought through blog posts and random internet rants. MASSIVE shout out to Hank Quinlan's excellent walk through which taught me how to use Jekyll! 

You can find some of the latest posts below and there's an RSS feed hidden here somewhere as well... I'm just not 100% sure where I actually put it.
